attributes.title: Essence of Choice of Life, Death and Birth
attributes.description: From the works of Living Enlightened Master Paramahamsa Nithyananda.  In this clip taken from discourse titled, "From Known to Knowing" Swamiji gives us a beautiful example from the teachings of Ramana Maharshi to move the attention from the seer to the seen.  Swmaiji goes on to describe in depth that the state in which we spend most of our time in this life will dictate the essence of the next birth.  He tells us that a very few rare souls who go beyond these three states consciously come down to the earth out of their compassion.  They are called avatars.  The complete discourse may be ordered on line or downloaded at www.lifeblissgalleria.com.
